Changes scene to the addUpdateCustomer form to allow creation of a new Customer basicStage.setStage() as defined in lambda expression above used here to change scenes
onAllApptView() - Method in class controller.MainFormController
Filters the apptTable appointments to show all appointments
onApptCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddUpdateApptsController
Changes the current scene back to the MainForm.fxml.
onCancel() - Method in class controller.LoginScreenController
Exits program
onCustCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddUpdateCustomerController
Changes the current scene back to the MainForm.fxml.
onCustSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddUpdateCustomerController
New or updated Customer is either saved to database or an error message is displayed for user to correct.
onDeleteAppt() - Method in class controller.MainFormController
Deletes the selected Appt from the database.
onDeleteCust() - Method in class controller.MainFormController
Deletes the selected customer from the database.
onExit() - Method in class controller.MainFormController
exits program.
onHome(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsController
Changes scene to MainForm.fxml when the HOME button is clicked
onLoginSubmit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreenController
Compares user input of username and password with existing user info in database.
onMonthApptView() - Method in class controller.MainFormController
Filters the apptTable appointments to show only appointments within the current month.
onReports(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
lambda expression is used to change scene to Reports.fxml.
onSaveAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddUpdateApptsController
Saves new or updated Appt to the database.
onUpdateAppt(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
Changes scene to the addUpdateAppt form to allow updating of an existing Appt.
onUpdateCust(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
Determines if a Customer is selected and, if so, changes scene to addUpdateCustomer.fxml.
onWeekApptView() - Method in class controller.MainFormController
Filters the apptTable appointments to show only appointments within the current week.
openConnection() - Static method in class databaseHelp.SqlCon
Opens the connection to the database
